title: HELP OUR VETERANS! Comp and pension exams TRAVEL AND LODGING PAID! at Locumtenens.com (Oklahoma)
text: Source: LocumTenens.com Specialty needed: Internal Medicine Physicians, General Practice Physicians, Occupational Medicine Physicians, Family Practice Physicians Location: 85 miles from Oklahoma City Practice setting: Our private clinic partners with VA Hospitals to render services to ­our service men and women­ whom served this great nation.­ Many of them have waited for ­over 2 years and beyond­ to receive their disability ratings. The­ physician that provides this honorable service is considered to be one of great nobility.­ Being that­ your reports have a substantial weight on­ service member's rating, this position can be labor intensive; regarding medical reports.­ There ­are absolutely no treatments; comprehensive physicals only!!! Although your evaluation does carry ample bearing; you don’t make final determination of compensability and disability. Dates or start date: Start Now, M-F, weekends, very flexible schedule Shift times: 8 a.m. -5 p.m., You are paid by the hour and not by the patient.­ Additionally, you get paid by the hour to complete reports from home! Patients per day: 4 to 6 patients per day Ages seen: Adults only EMR: proprietary software that handshakes with VA Hospital EMR. Training will be given. The onboarding process is a­ very organized program to coach you through report templates. Support staff: Family Nurse Practitioners, Medical Assistants, other Physicians Procedures: NONE; Evaluations only DEA required: No
